summary: A mod for Lore_Master's (Ifunny) character. Adds him in the game at Palace Of Kings
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]FOLLOWER
[/size]Hayden Great-Bear
Nord

[size=6]ORIGIN
[/size]If you wish to know about Hayden, go to Lore_Master on iFunny (iOS, Android, Google Play)

[size=6]GEAR
[/size]Hayden has Nord Armor, a Helm Of Yngol, Ysgramor's Shield, Wuuthrad, and a Nord Hero sword. These are all renamed to fit lore, and the Nord Hero Sword has Wuuthrad's enchantment.

[size=6]ABOUT HAYDEN
[/size]Found in the Palace Of Kings, is a stormcloak, companion, hero, and a friend of the Dovahkiin

[size=6]FUTURE UPDATES/KNOWN BUGS
[/size]I will hopefully add a quest to get Hayden as a follower, most likely will be [i]Joining The Stormcloak
[/i]House Mod to go along with this mod


[size=3]Hayden you lil shit get back to Lore_Master[/size]
author: The Skyrim Guild

files.name: HaydenGreatBear (OLD) (RALOF VOICE)
files.changelogHtml:
Hayden now has his own outfit, fixing the "Naked" glitch
Hayden now has his own outfit, fixing the "Two Armor Sets" glitch
